# [Spyke](https://spyke.social)

Spyke Provider

## Implementation Details

- Provider
Name: Spyke
- Documentation: NONE
- HTTPS support: YES
- Fake Response: NO
- Oembed Params: maxwidth , maxheight
- Supported Hosts: *.spyke.social
- Responsive response: NO
- Collections: DefaultProviderCollection
